name: frames
description: Frames is a simple self-hosted dashboard framework for presenting styled cards, metrics, and links. It allows users to create personalized start pages for servers or projects using a minimal config file.
features: Dashboard: Styled cards and metrics, Link presentation, Minimal config. Personalized start pages.
Customization: Create unique layouts. Flexible design.
Server Pages: Perfect for project dashboards. Professional presentation.
Lightweight: Fast and simple. Quick deployment.
Card System: Modular components. Flexible layouts.
Metrics Display: Show key statistics. Visual insights.
Link Management: Organize important links. Quick access.
Config-Based: Simple YAML setup. Easy configuration.
Responsive: Works on all devices. Mobile-friendly.
